item.title: WATCH: Sea otter mom and pup spotted swimming along the California coast
item.description: The heartwarming sight of an otter mom and her pup playing and spinning in the water greeted visitors to the Morro Bay Harbor Walk on Tuesday along Ca...

item.title: Writing on shell cases discovered at scene where United Healthcare CEO was shot dead
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot near a Midtown Manhattan hotel in a potentially targeted shooting early Wednesday, according to police.

item.title: 2 students, 5 and 6, in critical condition after shooting at California school
item.description: A gunman opened fire at a Christian grammar school in California on Wednesday, authorities said.

item.title: Gabbard's views on Russia shaped in part by Kremlin propaganda outlet, ex-aides say

item.title: Bitcoin races past $100,000, fueled by post-election rally
item.description: The price of bitcoin has surged more than 40% since Election Day.
